title: Erie Canalway National Heritage Corridor: Donate
body: Donate       Erie Canalway National Heritage Corridor is able to accept direct donations.  If you are interested, you may contact us at 518-237-7000 ext. 204. Please make checks out to "National Park Service". For security and other reasons, you cannot make on-line contributions directly to Erie Canalway NHC or the National Park Service. Donations may be mailed to: Superintendent Erie Canalway National Heritage Corridor PO Box 219 Waterford, NY 12188
